comment._content: This is a great photo because of the little girl facing the camera.

comment._content:
Also documents the appearance of the old West Wing at the time.

Clear date "11/25/13" on caption.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
White House wedding of the President's daughter, Jessie Woodrow Wilson, and Francis Sayre.

The scene as it looked eight days earlier:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4564875457/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 29350288@N06
comment._content: Wystan-- thanks, you're quite right. I didn't look at the full sized photo, and mistakenly thought that was the South Portico at the right. Oops!
